column2: though! Bone marrow and foie appetizers
column4: delicious. Marrow came with these caramelized onions that Â tasted like candy. Excellent. Foie is pretty much the same as at Maude's and Au Cheval
column5: so if you've been and you want to branch out
column6: I'd say skip it. The surprise was the smoked whitefish Caesar salad
column7: which was truly amazing. I would come back for that.
